snippet.title: Eels on verge of NRL powerhouse status
snippet.content: PARRAMATTA have found success on the field, stability within the club and have a new 30,000-seat stadium in the works. The future looks bright for the Eels, but in the bigger picture, this is just the start of something potentially monumental for the club. This is about the club's long-term future and the fact it is shaping up as such an NRL powerhouse. The launching pad to even becoming the Broncos of Sydney's west.
